text:
I bought these because they are a quick and easy way to get my coffee fix.
The price on Amazon was 50% cheaper than what I saw at StarBucks stores.

They are not as good as fresh brewed coffee, but the result is still impressive.
This is not the rancid instant coffee that has been around for decades.

I gave this three stars because the flavor is adequate only.

These will not replace brewed coffee, but will definitely be useful when I'm short on time or options!
